div.sent: We live in the same house with father, mother, sisters and brothers.
Very often grandfather, grandmother, uncles and aunts also live in the same family.
We will keep our own rooms clean.
We will always keep our homes clean.
A clean home is good for health.
The environment of home is polluted if the home is dirty.
And the polluted environment makes life dangerous.
We study everyday on getting up in the morning.
We will keep the table tidy after studying.
We will make sure that there is no dust on the table and the chair.
After reading we will wipe the table and chair.
Very often we study sitting on a mat.
We will roll the mat and put it in a comer.
We will arrange the books at a fixed place.
On coming home from school, we will set in order our clothes and shoes.
We will not throw pieces of papers and garbage in the room.
We will keep a basket in the room.
We will fix a place outside the room and put garbage there.
We will do our own work.
We will not give trouble to others.
Similarly, we will be careful to keep the school clean.
The classmates will do all this work as a team.
We ourselves will keep classrooms, playground and compound neat and clean.
We will do it carefully.
There is pleasure in doing one's own work.
In many schools there are sweepers, peons, guards, and waiters to do various activities.
The sweeper keeps the classrooms and playgrounds clean.
The peon does various activities of the school.
He helps us to enter the classrooms in time by ringing the bell.
The guard guards the school.
The teachers give us lessons.
To run the school properly, we need their services.
We will respect their work.
We go to school by boat, by bus, by rickshaw, by van and other transports.
We will be respectful to their labour.
Farmers work hard to produce crops and we live on that.
Fishermen keep us from malnutrition by supplying fish.
The masons build our homes.
Weavers provide us with clothes by weaving them.
Labourers meet our daily necessities by producing various items of daily use.
Shopkeepers meet our demands by selling various things.
By cooperating with us in our daily activities, servants make our life easy and comfortable.
By producing various kinds of commodities, labourers fulfil our daily necessities.
By selling various kinds of things shopkeepers fulfil our various types of demand.
We get the services of people.
We cannot do without their services.
We will love the working class people.
We will stand by them in their trouble.
We will help them.
We will always respect them.
Working class people help the society run smoothly.
Without them, we could not lead our life well.
We all have to depend on them in our daily work.
All working class people have the same dignity.
Their importance in our society is immense.
We will all be respectful to their labour.
